{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3523023,"name":"","username":"rnazeem","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/r/9fc29f/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-02-11T03:37:48.615Z","cooked":"

hello, this is our first year using a kraken x60 for drive and a neo for steer. I originally had issues with it twitching on enable, but I fixed that. Now when I push forward on the left joystick of a ps5 controller instead of going straight it’s erratically spinning. here is my code, and please let me know your suggestions. I have also added a video of a previous issue. now it’s going straight and ends straight, but before it ended at an angled place. if anyone has sample code of this same setup I would appreciate it.

github.com
